tool_description: Climate Change news from the most trusted sources. Nasa, UN, and more. Flexible, reliable, and fast with low latency. Includes thumbnails, filtering, and pagination
name: Climate News Feed
title: Climate News Feed

api_list.name: Article page
Get all publications
api_list.description: Get the name of all publications this API delivers news from.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com/publications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com/publications"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-news-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Articles
api_list.description:
Gets all articles.

query examples:
source = United Nations, Nasa Climate, The Guardian, Carbon Brief
Limit = 100 (default)
exclude=The Guardian
